movie.title: Bad Match
movie.description_intro: Harris just wants to hook up and have one night stands. All in good fun though, he finds his hook ups on a dating app. He spends his days working, playing video games, and swiping left and right for his next victim. All is well in the world of Harris until he swiped and matched with Riley. Unlike his other conquest riley won't go away so quietly like all the other girls. Slowly everything in Harris's life begins to fall apart.
movie.description_full: Harris just wants to hook up and have one night stands. All in good fun though, he finds his hook ups on a dating app. He spends his days working, playing video games, and swiping left and right for his next victim. All is well in the world of Harris until he swiped and matched with Riley. Unlike his other conquest riley won't go away so quietly like all the other girls. Slowly everything in Harris's life begins to fall apart.

movies.title: Payday
movies.summary: Ben's an inexperienced criminal, who's attempt at robbing a small-town restaurant, quickly spirals out of control. Trapped inside with him is his girlfriend; Adie Graham, a clever sociopath who's the manager and masterminded of the theft in order to cover up evidence of her embezzlement. As Ben tries to keep her involvement a secret whilst negotiating with the police, Adie plays a fast and dirty game of deceit and manipulation, in order to come out on top - no matter who gets hurt.

Trapped inside with him is his girlfriend; Adie Graham, a clever sociopath who's the manager and masterminded of the theft in order to cover up evidence of her embezzlement. movies.title: The Klatos Paradox
movies.summary: An incompetent time traveler must team up with his unpredictable alternate self, to fix a paradox which is now slowly destroying the universe.
movies.description_full: An incompetent time traveler must team up with his unpredictable alternate self, to fix a paradox which is now slowly destroying the universe.
movies.synopsis: An incompetent time traveler must team up with his unpredictable alternate self, to fix a paradox which is now slowly destroying the universe.

movies.title: Back to the Future Part II
movies.title_english: Back to the Future Part II
movies.title_long: Back to the Future Part II (1989)
movies.summary: Marty McFly has only just gotten back from the past, when he is once again picked up by Dr. Emmett Brown and sent through time to the future. Marty's job in the future is to pose as his own son to prevent him from being thrown in prison. Unfortunately, things get worse when the future changes the present.
movies.description_full: Marty McFly has only just gotten back from the past, when he is once again picked up by Dr. Emmett Brown and sent through time to the future. Marty's job in the future is to pose as his own son to prevent him from being thrown in prison. Unfortunately, things get worse when the future changes the present.

movies.title: Howl
movies.summary: When passengers on a train are attacked by a creature, they must band together in order to survive until morning.
movies.description_full: When passengers on a train are attacked by a creature, they must band together in order to survive until morning.
